Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.characters.CharacterCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericModifierCard, StopCardActivatorCard, StudentHostingCard
public abstract class CharacterCard extends Object
This Class is the abstract base class representing the CharacterCards

    • useCard

      public abstract int useCard(TableManager t, List<Player> players, Player currentPlayer, CharacterCardParamSet userInfo) throws CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException, CharacterCardNoMoreUsesAvailableException
      Uses a Character Card effect
      Parameters:
      t - The Table Manager object which might be used to get data (such as Students)
      players - The List of Players in the match
      currentPlayer - The current Player who used the card
      userInfo - Additional card parameters for the action
      Returns:
      an integer holding the numeric result of the effect
      Throws:
      CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException - If the parameters are incorrect
      CharacterCardNoMoreUsesAvailableException - If the card cannot be used anymore in the same turn
